properties.entry: SELECT * FROM ( SELCT ROWNUM "RNUM", A.* FROM ( SELECT CONSULT_NO , CONSULT_TITLE , TO_CHAR(ENROLL_DATE, 'YYYY/MM/DD') "ENROLL_DATE" , CONSULT_CATEGORY , ANSWER_STATUS FROM CONSULT C JOIN MEMBER M ON (M.USER_NO = C.USER_NO) WHERE C.USER_NO = ? , C.STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY COUNSULT_NO DESC ) A ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?
SELECT COUNT(*) "COUNT" FROM CONSULT WHERE STATUS = 'Y'

SELECT REVIEW_NO , PRO_NAME , P.PRICE , P.THUMB_IMG , M.USER_ID , REVIEW_TITLE , REVIEW_CONTENT , STAR , R.MODIFY_DATE , R.ENROLL_DATE , REVIEW_PHOTO , R.FILE_PATH , R.STATUS FORM REVIEW R JOIN ORD_PRO O ON (O.PRO_NO = R.PRO_NO) JOIN PRODUCT P ON (P.PRO_NO = R.PRO_NO) JOIN MEMBER M ON (M.USER_NO = R.USER_NO) WHERE PRO_NO = ?

INSERT INTO ( REVIEW_NO , PRO_NAME , USER_ID , REVIEW_TITLE , REVIEW_CONTENT , STAR , MODIFY_DATE , ENROLL_DATE , REVIEW_PHOTO , FILE_PATH ) VALUES ( SEQ_REVIEWNO , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , SYSDATE , SYSDATE , ? , ? ) WHERE PRO_NO = ? AND USER_NO = ?
UPDATE REVIEW SET REVIEW_TITLE = ? , REVIEW_CONTENT = ? , STAR = ? , MODIFY_DATE = SYSDATE , REVIEW_PHOTO = ? , FILE_PATH = ? WHERE REVIEW_NO = ? AND STATUS = 'Y'
UPDATE REVIEW SET STATUS = 'N' WHERE REVIEW_NO = ?

SELECT REVIEW_NO , PRO_NAME , USER_ID , REVIEW_TITLE , REVIEW_CONTENT , STAR , MODIFY_DATE , ENROLL_DATE , REVIEW_PHOTO , FILE_PATH FROM REVIEW R LEFT JOIN PRODUCT P ON (R.PRO_NO = P.PRO_NO) LEFT JOIN MEMBER M ON (R.USER_NO = M.USER_NO) WHERE PRO_NO = ?
SELECT PRO_NO, ROUND(AVG(STAR),1) FROM REVIEW WHERE PRO_NO = ? GROUP BY PRO_NO;
